snippet: Ryan Dickinson, 20, accepted a plea bargain Friday in Vancouver Provincial Court and will be sentenced Feb. 7. His charges include participating in the June 15 riot after the Canucks lost Game 7 of the Stanley Cup finals and breach of recognizance.
abstract: Ryan Dickinson, 20, accepted a plea bargain Friday in Vancouver Provincial Court and will be sentenced Feb. 7. His charges include participating in the June 15 riot after the Canucks lost Game 7 of the Stanley Cup finals and breach of recognizance.
